### Pre-requisites:

* None, First Year Undergrad Course


### Reference textbooks:

1. Chan, Stanley. “Introduction to Probability for Data Science.” The University of Michigan Library, Michigan Publishing (2021). [Free Digital Copy](https://probability4datascience.com/)
2. Adhikari, Ani, John DeNero, and D. Wagner. "Computational and Inferential Thinking: The Foundations of Data Science." Second Edition. The University of California, Berkeley (2019). [Free Digital Copy](https://inferentialthinking.com/chapters/intro.html)
3. Deisenroth, Marc Peter, A. Aldo Faisal, and Cheng Soon Ong. Mathematics for Machine Learning. Cambridge University Press, 2020. [Free Digital Copy](https://mml-book.github.io/)
4. Spiegelhalter, David. The Art of Statistics: Learning from Data. Penguin UK, 2019.
5. Rougier, Nicolas. Scientific Visualization: Python+ Matplotlib. 2021. [Free Digital Copy](https://github.com/rougier/scientific-visualization-book)
